string-array.name: gameModeNames
string-array.item: Basic Delay\n(timer stops before a players turn for a fixed amount of time)
Fischer\n(time is incremented before a players turn for a fixed amount of time)
Fischer After\n(time is incremented after a players turn for a fixed amount of time)
Bronstein\n(time is incremented after a players turn up to a certain amount of time)
Hour Glass\n(time lost by one player is gained by the other)
